verses.verse: וְיַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> ve-ya-'a-Ko And Jacob הָלַ֣ךְ <WH1980> ha-Lach went לְדַרְכּ֑וֹ <WH1870> le-dar-Ko; on his way וַיִּפְגְּעוּ־ <WH6293> vai-yif-ge-'u- met ב֖וֹ vo מַלְאֲכֵ֥י <WH4397> mal-'a-Chei and the angels אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> E-lo-Him. of God

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer he said יַעֲקֹב֙ <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko And when Jacob כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher he רָאָ֔ם <WH7200> ra-'Am, saw them מַחֲנֵ֥ה <WH4264> ma-cha-Neh host אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> E-lo-Him This [is] God's זֶ֑ה <WH2088> Zeh; This וַיִּקְרָ֛א <WH7121> vai-yik-Ra and he called שֵֽׁם־ <WH8034> shem- the name הַמָּק֥וֹם <WH4725> ham-ma-Kom of that place הַה֖וּא <WH1931> ha-Hu he מַֽחֲנָֽיִם׃ <WH4266> Ma-cha-Na-yim. Mahanaim פ Peh

וַיִּשְׁלַ֨ח <WH7971> vai-yish-Lach sent יַעֲקֹ֤ב <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko And Jacob מַלְאָכִים֙ <WH4397> mal-'a-Chim messengers לְפָנָ֔יו <WH6440> le-fa-Nav, before him אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about עֵשָׂ֖ו <WH6215> 'e-Sav to Esau אָחִ֑יו <WH251> 'a-Chiv; his brother אַ֥רְצָה <WH776> 'Ar-tzah unto the land שֵׂעִ֖יר <WH8165> se-'Ir of Seir שְׂדֵ֥ה <WH7704> se-Deh the country אֱדֽוֹם׃ <WH123> e-Dom. of Edom

וַיְצַ֤ו <WH6680> vay-Tzav And he commanded אֹתָם֙ <WH853> 'o-Tam לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> le-Mor, them saying כֹּ֣ה <WH3541> koh Thus תֹאמְר֔וּן <WH559> tom-Run, Thus shall ye speak לַֽאדֹנִ֖י <WH113> la-do-Ni unto my lord לְעֵשָׂ֑ו <WH6215> le-'e-Sav; Esau כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> koh Thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> 'a-Mar saith עַבְדְּךָ֣ <WH5650> 'av-de-Cha Thy servant יַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko, Jacob עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- with לָבָ֣ן <WH3837> la-Van with Laban גַּ֔רְתִּי <WH1481> Gar-ti, thus I have sojourned וָאֵחַ֖ר <WH309> va-'e-Char and stayed there עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- until עָֽתָּה׃ <WH6258> 'At-tah. now

וַֽיְהִי־ <WH1961> vay-hi- have לִי֙ li שׁ֣וֹר <WH7794> Shor And I have oxen וַחֲמ֔וֹר <WH2543> va-cha-Mor, and asses צֹ֖אן <WH6629> tzon flocks וְעֶ֣בֶד <WH5650> ve-'E-ved and menservants וְשִׁפְחָ֑ה <WH8198> ve-shif-Chah; and womenservants וָֽאֶשְׁלְחָה֙ <WH7971> va-'esh-le-Chah and I have sent לְהַגִּ֣יד <WH5046> le-hag-Gid to tell לַֽאדֹנִ֔י <WH113> la-do-Ni, my lord לִמְצֹא־ <WH4672> lim-tzo- that I may find חֵ֖ן <WH2580> chen grace בְּעֵינֶֽיךָ׃ <WH5869> be-'ei-Nei-cha. in thy sight

וַיִּירָ֧א <WH3372> vai-yi-Ra afraid יַעֲקֹ֛ב <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko Then Jacob מְאֹ֖ד <WH3966> me-'Od was greatly וַיֵּ֣צֶר <WH3334> vai-Ye-tzer and distressed ל֑וֹ lo; וַיַּ֜חַץ <WH2673> vai-Ya-chatz and he divided אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָעָ֣ם <WH5971> ha-'Am the people אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- who אִתּ֗וֹ <WH854> it-To, for וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַצֹּ֧אן <WH6629> hatz-Tzon that [was] with him and the flocks וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַבָּקָ֛ר <WH1241> hab-ba-Kar and herds וְהַגְּמַלִּ֖ים <WH1581> ve-hag-ge-mal-Lim and the camels לִשְׁנֵ֥י <WH8147> lish-Nei into two מַחֲנֽוֹת׃ <WH4264> ma-cha-Not. bands

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer And said אִם־ <WH518> 'im- If יָב֥וֹא <WH935> ya-Vo come עֵשָׂ֛ו <WH6215> 'e-Sav If Esau אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about הַמַּחֲנֶ֥ה <WH4264> ham-ma-cha-Neh company הָאַחַ֖ת <WH259> ha-'a-Chat to the one וְהִכָּ֑הוּ <WH5221> ve-hik-Ka-hu; and smite it וְהָיָ֛ה <WH1961> ve-ha-Yah then הַמַּחֲנֶ֥ה <WH4264> ham-ma-cha-Neh then the other company הַנִּשְׁאָ֖ר <WH7604> han-nish-'Ar which is left לִפְלֵיטָֽה׃ <WH6413> lif-lei-Tah. shall escape

וַיֹּאמֶר֮ <WH559> vai-yo-Mer said יַעֲקֹב֒ <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko And Jacob אֱלֹהֵי֙ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei O God אָבִ֣י <WH1> 'a-Vi of my father אַבְרָהָ֔ם <WH85> 'av-ra-Ham, Abraham וֵאלֹהֵ֖י <WH430> ve-lo-Hei and God אָבִ֣י <WH1> 'a-Vi of my father יִצְחָ֑ק <WH3327> yitz-Chak; Isaac יְהוָ֞ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD הָאֹמֵ֣ר <WH559> ha-'o-Mer which saidst אֵלַ֗י <WH413> 'e-Lai, to me שׁ֧וּב <WH7725> shuv unto me Return לְאַרְצְךָ֛ <WH776> le-'ar-tze-Cha unto thy country וּלְמוֹלַדְתְּךָ֖ <WH4138> u-le-mo-lad-te-Cha and to thy kindred וְאֵיטִ֥יבָה <WH3190> ve-'ei-Ti-vah and I will deal well עִמָּֽךְ׃ <WH5973> 'im-Mach. with

קָטֹ֜נְתִּי <WH6994> ka-To-ne-ti I am not worthy of the least מִכֹּ֤ל <WH3605> mik-Kol of all הַחֲסָדִים֙ <WH2617> ha-cha-sa-Dim of all the mercies וּמִכָּל־ <WH3605> u-mik-kol- all הָ֣אֱמֶ֔ת <WH571> ha-'e-Met, and of all the truth אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which עָשִׂ֖יתָ <WH6213> 'a-Si-ta which thou hast shewed אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עַבְדֶּ֑ךָ <WH5650> 'av-De-cha; unto thy servant כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki with בְמַקְלִ֗י <WH4731> ve-mak-Li, for with my staff עָבַ֙רְתִּי֙ <WH5674> 'a-Var-ti I passed over אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַיַּרְדֵּ֣ן <WH3383> hai-yar-Den this Jordan הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> haz-Zeh, this וְעַתָּ֥ה <WH6258> ve-'at-Tah and now הָיִ֖יתִי <WH1961> ha-Yi-ti have become לִשְׁנֵ֥י <WH8147> lish-Nei and now I am become two מַחֲנֽוֹת׃ <WH4264> ma-cha-Not. bands

וְאָֽמַרְתָּ֙ <WH559> ve-'a-mar-Ta Then thou shalt say לְעַבְדְּךָ֣ <WH5650> le-'av-de-Cha [They be] thy servant לְיַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> le-ya-'a-Ko, Jacob's מִנְחָ֥ה <WH4503> min-Chah it [is] a present הִוא֙ <WH1931> hi he שְׁלוּחָ֔ה <WH7971> she-lu-Chah, sent לַֽאדֹנִ֖י <WH113> la-do-Ni unto my lord לְעֵשָׂ֑ו <WH6215> le-'e-Sav; Esau וְהִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh and behold גַם־ <WH1571> gam- also ה֖וּא <WH1931> hu he אַחֲרֵֽינוּ׃ <WH310> 'a-cha-Rei-nu. and behold also he [is] behind us

וַאֲמַרְתֶּ֕ם <WH559> va-'a-mar-Tem And say ye גַּ֗ם <WH1571> Gam, moreover הִנֵּ֛ה <WH2009> hin-Neh Behold עַבְדְּךָ֥ <WH5650> 'av-de-Cha Behold thy servant יַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko Jacob אַחֲרֵ֑ינוּ <WH310> 'a-cha-Rei-nu; [is] behind us כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for אָמַ֞ר <WH559> 'a-Mar For he said אֲכַפְּרָ֣ה <WH3722> 'a-chap-pe-Rah I will appease פָנָ֗יו <WH6440> fa-Nav, him בַּמִּנְחָה֙ <WH4503> bam-min-Chah with the present הַהֹלֶ֣כֶת <WH1980> ha-ho-Le-chet that goeth לְפָנָ֔י <WH6440> le-fa-Nai, before me וְאַחֲרֵי־ <WH310> ve-'a-cha-rei- and afterward כֵן֙ <WH3651> chen after that אֶרְאֶ֣ה <WH7200> 'er-'Eh I will see פָנָ֔יו <WH6440> fa-Nav, his face אוּלַ֖י <WH194> 'u-Lai perhaps יִשָּׂ֥א <WH5375> yis-Sa peradventure he will accept פָנָֽי׃ <WH6440> fa-Nai. of me
